'''1.5.2 Build 1''' is the first and only build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.2, released on September 13, 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.2]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Bats are affected by Animals & Villagers setting.
* [[Slime]]s, [[magma cube]]s, and [[ghast]]s are affected by monsters setting.
* [[Flint & steel]] doesn't work if Fire & TNT is disabled.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Edu keybindings / commands not working.
* Servertool not installing in some cases ([[MinecraftEdu 1.5.1 Build 16|1.5.1 build 16]])
* Disabled WorldEdit selection rendering due to instability issues.
